item.description:
Watch a slide show of our First Ever EAA Young Eagles rally.... We'll be featured on Fitchburg Access Television soon, too.. AKA FATV... We might have their DVD too.
Ed Murphy will update us on the sucess of our flights.. And then what do we do???

More meeting details to be announced!

Food will be a cookout on our new grille. Dogs and burgers. Cooked by Bob and Matt Scales

If you missed the last meeting, you missed a lot!
item.why: Dinner, slide show and chat from 6:00 - 7:00. Meeting starts at 7:00. Always a good time.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 July Meeting
